local_intent: Verify presence of computed grasp pose 'white_plate_grasp'; if missing, detect the white plate and recompute the rim-pinch grasp, then approach, pick, and confirm object in gripper.
assumptions: White plate is still reachable and visible for a rapid re-detection
Gripper is open (per GLOBAL_BT initial OpenGripper) and ready for pick
Recomputed grasp pose will be stored under the same key used by the global tree
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT semantics: ensures 'white_plate_grasp' is available (recomputing if needed), then follows the original sequence of approach, pick, and verification before proceeding to red-plate placement.
